name: Aztlan: Rise of the Shaman
description:
A game by Ayuken Studios:

  • Marc Borràs Martinez
  • Pedro Fuentes Ruiz
  • Ibai Jurado Martín
  • Verónica Llinares Benadero
  • Isaac Molero Quesada

And music by Francisco Gómez Aracil.

Here's the official web page with more info and videos about the project!

Thank you for playing!

Note: Please consider playing the builds below if you have performance issues and for best visual quality.
